note: THE REPRESSIONS are an NYC forest-music/folk-punk band, featuring Barbara Dragon and Nate Lay. They write songs about books, nature, defending animals, injustice, and mental health. You can find their music on all major streaming platforms and see their live shows live in New York City and twice weekly on their Twitch channel. The band dedicates their music to anyone who has ever been made to feel small for being sensitive, kind, smart, or ill.
